channel.title: I've got some goodies
channel.description:
Hello all. Some of you may have heard my first dubstep. I have good news for those of you that enjoyed it.
I finished it: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2FBlTbYdpY&feature=mfu_in_order&list=UL]L7 - goodgood[/url]
Also, if you want to check out some other's I've made:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m0V7HbHIMgo&feature=mfu_in_order&list=UL]L7 - Fear[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NyQAXrz8XSM&feature=mfu_in_order&list=UL]L7 - Popularity[/url]
I've yet to finish the last two. However, I'm hoping to get them done sometime in the next week or two.
Feedback, enjoy, etc.

item.title: I've got some goodies
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:11, topic:387486”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=483288.msg3540038#msg3540038 date=1300799460]
for dubstep i used reason for a while but it sucks to get acapellas in there
so i tried cubase wich is pretty decent along with acid, protools, ableton live

trying to figure out ableton atm, only made some rap beats with it atm but yeah fl studio sucks in my opinon, maybe its just me

&yeah massive is the best plugin for wobble bass no doubt
[/quote]Would you mind linking me to a working torrent for ableton? I can’t seem to find a working one anywhere. Or maybe I am downloading a working one, but for some reason when I patch it it still doesn’t allow me to save? Do you know if there’s something I’m doing wrong?[/quote]

with the keygen/crack/serial i used (not sure) i needed to let it download all sounds, when it was done let it patch and then use the crack/keygen or serial
it works perfectly fine now

  • i used this one http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5550766/Ableton_Live_Suite_8.1.1___Easy_Patch

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:9, topic:387486”]for dubstep i used reason for a while but it sucks to get acapellas in there
so i tried cubase wich is pretty decent along with acid, protools, ableton live

trying to figure out ableton atm, only made some rap beats with it atm but yeah fl studio sucks in my opinon, maybe its just me

&yeah massive is the best plugin for wobble bass no doubt[/quote]Would you mind linking me to a working torrent for ableton? I can’t seem to find a working one anywhere. Or maybe I am downloading a working one, but for some reason when I patch it it still doesn’t allow me to save? Do you know if there’s something I’m doing wrong?

item.title: I've got some goodies
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:8, topic:387486”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=483288.msg3540013#msg3540013 date=1300797774]

FL Studio 9? That’s the best program to use for making your own beat/tunes.
[/quote]I do use FL Studio 9. However, it is not the best. I’m hoping to get Ableton Live Studio Suite soon. I’d say that’s one of the best out there.

I also use Massive and FM8 by Native Instruments for my synth and bass lines.

Did you buy FL Studio? Cause I was thinking about it but its pretty pricey.[/quote]

There’s no need, keygen it.

Read full topic
